name: 3rd International Conference on Innovation in Teaching and Education
content: The 3rd International Conference on Innovation in Teaching and Education is a premier global event bringing together leading education experts to explore the latest breakthroughs, innovative teaching techniques, and key challenges in the field. Set against the backdrop of the historic city of London, this conference offers a unique platform for educators, researchers, and professionals to exchange knowledge, participate in thought-provoking discussions, and connect with peers worldwide. Dates: July 18-20, 2025 Location: London, UK Venue: University of London Conference Highlights Connect with Global Experts: Engage with educators, policymakers, industry leaders, and researchers from across the globe to uncover the latest trends, strategies, and technologies shaping the future of education. Interactive Sessions: Participate in dynamic discussions and debates that address pressing issues and challenges in education, inspiring innovative solutions and fostering collaboration. Publication Opportunities: Boost your academic standing by publishing your work in the Conference Proceedings (ISBN & DOI included) and explore further publication options in peer-reviewed journals and monographs. Explore London: Enjoy a complimentary guided city tour, where you’ll discover London’s rich history, culture, and architecture while networking with fellow attendees. Important Dates Abstract Submission Deadline: June 27, 2025 Early Registration Deadline: February 12, 2025 Late Registration Deadline: July 08, 2025 Conference Dates: July 18-20, 2025
